document_data.name: ''Elixir of Viciousness''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Elixirs of viciousness''''' were [[magic]] [[potion]]s that temporarily boosted the imbiber's chances to land especially devastating hits.
document_data.Description: ''Elixirs of viciousness'' were syrupy-thick concoctions that reminded those who looked into the liquid of predators lying in wait.
document_data.Powers: When consumed, the potions improved the imbiber's chances of landing particularly lucky and debilitating attacks. However, the effects of the potion were nullified if another long-lasting potion was consumed.
document_data.Creations: A recipe of this elixir required [[alchemical]] vitriol of [[shadowroot]] sacs mixed together with certain types of ashes.
